mapper.insert: insert into parent ( PARENT_NUMBER, PARENT_EMAIL, PARENT_PASSWORD, PARENT_NAME, PARENT_NICKNAME, PARENT_PHONE_NUMBER, PARENT_ADDRESS, ROLE) values (seq_project.NEXTVAL, #{parentEmail}, #{parentPassword}, #{parentName}, #{parentNickname}, #{parentPhoneNumber}, #{parentAddress}, 'parent')
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN #{parentEmail} ELSE NULL END AS result FROM parent WHERE parent_email = #{parentEmail}
